snippet: Atmospheric scientists described the depletion as a striking example of how sudden anomalies can occur as a result of human activity that occurred years ago.
lead_paragraph: Atmospheric scientists described the depletion as a striking example of how sudden anomalies can occur as a result of human activity that occurred years ago.

headline.main: A Significant Ozone Hole Is Reported Over the Arctic
headline.print_headline: A Significant Ozone Hole Is Reported Over the Arctic
headline.seo: Scientists Report Ozone Hole Over the Arctic
